span.p: To prepare students to succeed as responsible citizens in an ever-changing world, Minerva Central School, in partnership with the community, will provide an individualized, well-rounded education in order to build a strong foundation for personal growth and life-long learning

span.strong: We are asking families to put a box or tote out for food andmaterial deliveries.

We are trying to limit contact as much as possible.
Thank you for your help.
Please call the school if you have any questions or concerns.
